cause.description:
in the harsh world we live in, no one is safe any more...we are threatened by war. not just against humans only, but also against nature and god himself. famine, global warming, draught, flood, earthquakes and other forces of nature are too upon us all. even human stupidity has led to a loss of life.
this cause is for the betterment of our planet and of our lives to come. we are still children, but there may not be a world for our children to live.
fight for the right we deserve
1. life is ours for the taking
cause.mission: make this world a better place
cause.name: Life at our hands
